response.overview: Depeche Mode: Random Access Memory is the full and unauthorized story of one of Britains finest bands. It features exclusive in-depth interviews with those who worked closely with them during their career, including; Brian Griffin - Internationally renowned photographer and film maker who shot Depeches most acclaimed sleeves, Jonathan Miller - author of 'Stripped: Depeche Mode', musician and close friend Phil Burdett who played with Martin Gore in previous bands and many others. Depeche Mode are back in October with their first new recordings in more than four years.
response.title: Depeche Mode: Random Access Memory
